skill.name: debugging
skill.description: Comprehensive debugging specialist for errors, test failures, log analysis, and system problems. Use when encountering issues, analyzing error logs, investigating system anomalies, debugging production issues, analyzing stack traces, or identifying root causes. Combines general debugging workflows with error pattern detection and log analysis.
skill.summary: Comprehensive debugging specialist for errors, test failures, log analysis, and system problems. Use...
skill.author: Joseph OBrien

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-focused debugging skill with minimal code execution risk. The only executable component is a Python log parsing script that reads user-specified files and outputs JSON analysis. The skill's capabilities align with its stated purpose of debugging assistance.

content.user_title: Debug code errors and analyze logs
content.value_statement: Debugging complex errors and analyzing logs takes significant time and expertise. This skill provides structured workflows for error analysis, log parsing, stack trace investigation, and root cause identification across multiple languages and platforms.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes error messages and stack traces across multiple programming languages
Parses log files to extract errors, exceptions, and patterns
Identifies root causes through systematic investigation workflows
Detects common error patterns including memory leaks, race conditions, and timeouts
Provides guidance for reproducing and fixing bugs
limitations: Cannot access external systems or databases directly
Cannot execute code or run tests on user systems
Cannot modify production systems or deploy fixes
Analysis is based on provided error information and log content

use_cases.title: Fix production bugs
use_cases.description: Analyze error logs and stack traces to identify root causes and implement fixes

use_cases.title: Debug test failures
use_cases.description: Investigate why tests are failing and identify the underlying code issues

use_cases.title: Investigate incidents
use_cases.description: Correlate errors across services and conduct postmortem analysis

prompt_templates.title: Analyze error message
prompt_templates.prompt: Debug this error: [paste error message and stack trace]

prompt_templates.title: Parse log file
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze the error logs in [file path] and identify the root cause

prompt_templates.title: Detect patterns
prompt_templates.prompt: Find patterns in these error logs from the past 24 hours

prompt_templates.title: Fix code issue
prompt_templates.prompt: Fix the null reference error at [file:line] with minimal changes

output_examples.input: Debug this error: TypeError: Cannot read property 'name' of undefined
output: Root Cause: getUser() returns undefined when user not found
Fix: Add null check before accessing user.name

best_practices: Start with symptoms before proposing solutions
Test hypotheses systematically rather than guessing
Implement minimal fixes that address root causes
anti_patterns: Applying fixes without understanding root causes
Ignoring error patterns across multiple incidents
Making large changes when a small fix suffices

faq.question: Which programming languages are supported?
faq.answer: JavaScript, Node.js, Python, Java, and other languages with standard stack trace formats.

faq.question: What log formats can be parsed?
faq.answer: Plain text logs, JSON logs, and common log formats with timestamps and error levels.

faq.question: How does this integrate with my IDE?
faq.answer: The skill works with any text-based error information. Copy-paste errors from your terminal or IDE.

faq.question: Is my log data processed externally?
faq.answer: No. All analysis happens locally. The Python script reads files and outputs JSON locally.

faq.question: Why is my debugging not finding the issue?
faq.answer: Ensure you provide the full error message, stack trace, and relevant log context. Some issues require additional logging.

faq.question: How is this different from standard error messages?
faq.answer: This skill provides structured analysis workflows, pattern detection, and systematic root cause identification.
